title: 冰与火之歌模组怎么修改龙的生成率
author: Z529998567
txt_content: 如题，找了半天都找不到龙

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
调节 config/ice_and_fire.cfg 中的

    # 1 out of this number chance per chunk for generation [range: 1 ~ 10000, default: 360]
    I:"Generate Dragon Roost Chance"=360


呢

replies.author: Z529998567
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-21 16:30
调节 config/ice_and_fire.cfg 中的

    # 1 out of this number chance per chunk for generation [range ...
是调小还是调大呢

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Z529998567 发表于 2020-1-21 16:31
是调小还是调大呢
调小就应该能提高龙的生成率吧
